name: WHOISCARRUS
description: We are WHOISCARRUS (who-is care-us), a Creative Advertising Agency that designs award-winning branding, video and interactive projects. With 5 full-time employees and a large network of talented contractors, we have the ability to grow with our clients on a per-project, customized basis. This means we keep our overhead low, and you get the quality of a full-service advertising agency while paying just a little more than a freelancer's rates.
